reviews.review: Ele é ruim estressante mas vale a pena (não)
I love this game. It's just a shame I have bad wifi x

Boring, repetative game without any balance whatsoever. Broken hitboxes, killers always get their hits even 4 meters away through a rock, Hilbilly and Nurse were created by some idiot, half of Killer players will camp and sit on one place. 
Only buy on HUGE sale and with 2 friends at least, other conditions - stay away

This game always has development all the time such as graphic or new DLC (Killer and Survive). I'm not bored this game. As I play Survival as main. It'll fun if you play with your party more than you play alone (You can also play alone too). You can play Killer when you play alone and play Survival when you play with your friend. It's good game and the original one.
real cool but buggy but fun

yes very good game. fun to play with friends

Great game! A lot of fun for killers & survivors when gens get lower in number... makes your heart race a little.

Very fun game as a survivor if you have friends to play with and communicate. If not, you really have to play killer because then you don't depend on anybody else except yourself. Being a survivor is hard as a solo queue because one bad teammate can ruin the game for 3 other really good survivors.

Игра очень интересная, давно я не залипал в комп, а тут аж 14 часов за одну неделю. Могу порекомендовать, главное пройти обучение, т.к. ниче не понятно будет в игре. Но когда научишься играть, то залипнешь, как минимум на 2 часа в день!
Extremely fun game with and without friends. If your not playing with friends I suggest going killer but if you have a full squad of four then go survivor both roles are really fun.
Jeu très amusant, j'y joue régulièrement sans vraiment m'en lasser.
为什么每次更新都要把整个游戏文件都读一遍 为什么？？？？

Definitiv seinen Preis wert! Ein bisschen Nervenkitzel, aber nicht zuviel um davon abzuraten. Die Wartezeiten sind tatsächlich dass einzige was zu bemängeln wäre, aber wenn man keine Eile hat ist man in ca.5Minuten in einer Runde :)

jogo mto bom e divertido menos contra swf
LOVE THIS GAME GET IT NOW
Decent game, Takes hundreds of hours to get really good.

老游戏了，知道目前杀机的玩家都是一群老油条了，入的时候也已经做好了心理准备，但是玩了几把体验依然比我预期还要恶心，匹配机制烂的一批暂且不说，游戏对待新手极其不友好，对新手而言丝毫没有一丁点游戏体验，我不知道新手是怎么匹配到那么高段的，你说你小众游戏玩家少我也就忍了，玩人被屠夫秒挂被屠夫嘲讽，玩屠人类秒修机疯狂溜被人类嘲讽，连练手的机会都没有，逼得我平时这么好脾气的人差点去买降压药，，你说你这么多年了你连个人机模式都舍不得加，，奉劝各位还想要入手的萌新一定要慎重，老游戏生命周期差不多也就这样了，如果不是信仰玩家没必要再去浪费这个钱，，我这退款已经退不了了，就当我这几十块钱白扔了，放库里吃灰去吧
Nobody reads the reviews for sure, so I'll say I'm gay because of this game

Fuck this game. Fuck this game in particular. Is fun tho.
